author: King0fBrains
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Speak!
Get started with `[p]help Speak`.
name: Speak
short: Allows you to talk as the bot!
description: Combination of Laggron42's *Say* cog, Obi-Wan3's *Reply* cog, and NeuroAssassin's editor cog. https://github.com/laggron42/Laggrons-Dumb-Cogs https://github.com/Obi-Wan3/OB13-Cogs https://github.com/NeuroAssassin/Toxic-Cogs
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
